attributes.action: Remove from office 650 MPs who are now completely surplus to requirements given that Gordon Brown has now signed over virtually all rights of the British people to Brussels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the UK is no more than a State within Europe and that unelected, unaccountable bureaucrats will control our armed forces, our police service, our financial institutions, our borders, our environmental policy etc, etc - why do we need parliament ?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
